attributes.action: bring the Israeli Government to book by bringing criminal charges of Genocide, war crimes, and crimes against humanity in the International Court of Justice in the Hague.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish our goverment to do it's utmost to ensure the Israeli government goes to the International Court of Justice in the Hague as a result of it's crimes against humanity.

rejection.details: This is an issue for the International Courts
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
